text: The Scottish Socialist Party (SSP; ; ) is a political party which was formed in 1998.Scottish election: Scottish Socialist Party profile. BBC. Published 13 April 2011. Retrieved 14 July 2017. It argues for socialism and Scottish independence. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:1998 establishments in Scotland Category:Political parties in Scotland Category:Socialist organisations in the United Kingdom
title: Scottish Socialist Party
